author: thewinner958
body: Ok, I am just going to ask this question. Are you going to make Powershell to work on libcurl4 because most programs that I have rely on this library and if I try to install libcurl3 it will not just remove libcurl4, but all programs that need it to run properly.

comments.author: thezim
comments.body: PowerShell Core no longer has a dependency on libcurl #6964

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: I confirm - no dependency on libcurl in PowerShell Core.

title: PowerShell working on libcurl4?
